urls.description: This report presents select findings from FRA‚Äôs 2019 survey on LGBTI people in the EU and North Macedonia and Serbia. With almost 140,000 participants, it is the largest survey of its kind. It follows the agency‚Äôs first survey on LGBT people in the EU, conducted in 2012. The new survey results show little progress over the past seven years. This opinion illustrates the extent and nature of lived experiences of inequality and discrimination across the EU.
